content.query:
USE master
GO;

IF DB_ID(N'CosmosDemo') IS NULL
BEGIN
    CREATE DATABASE CosmosDemo
END
GO;

USE CosmosDemo
GO;

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS HTAPDemo;
GO

--CREATE VIEW HTAPDemo
--AS 
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    'CosmosDB', --location
    N'account=trainingcosmosdb103;database=fictionalWorld;key=oNGpioQZp0RWZJOQffyWkQgUsv2djUicGC7AkR06jCdtRudvxwvFsaWWeljHmMGnVihpL9uTWDuFUnpeiU1d5g==',
    characters_analytical --container name
) 
WITH( -- selecting specific columns 
    id VARCHAR(30), 
    age INT,
    attributes VARCHAR(MAX)
) AS characters
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(attributes)
WITH( -- exploding the column variables into their own rows
    attribute_name VARCHAR(30),
    attribute_level INT

)
